item.title: Whale Accumulated 260,000 ETH in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On September 2nd, cryptocurrency analyst @ali_charts presented on-chain data indicating that within the past 24 hours, whales have amassed 260,000 ETH.

item.title: GoPlus Launches EIP-7702 Attack Defense Solution, Providing Comprehensive Protection for User Fund Security
item.description: On September 2nd, Ethereum's EIP-7702 Protocol became a new focus of hacker attacks, resulting in losses exceeding $5.3 million. According to the analysis of the GoPlus Security Research Institute, the attacker carried out the theft through means such as signature phishing, malicious upgrades, and permission misuse.As one of the first platforms to pay attention to the security threats of this protocol, GoPlus has received requests for help from multiple users who were victims of theft and has completed multiple in-depth security studies. In order to protect the funds of Web3 users, GoPlus announced that the transaction simulation API now fully supports 7702 security checks, which can accurately intercept various malicious transactions based on EIP-7702. The security browser extension will also soon launch relevant protection features.GoPlus advises users to: keep abreast of security knowledge and raise security awareness; promptly use GoPlus security tools to protect themselves and

item.title: Market Movement Warning Sign? Hyperliquid Whale Activity Intensifies, with Single-day Large Transactions Exceeding 100 Million USDC
item.description: On September 2nd, as per the monitoring of HyperInsight, Hyperliquid has once again witnessed multiple large deposits and withdrawals by whale-sized entities, as detailed below:Deposits:Address 0xEFd3 accumulated approximately 11 million USDC within a 24-hour period;Address 0xECB6 deposited around 46.69 million USDC during the same time frame;Withdrawals:Address 0x97E5 withdrew approximately 6.93 million USDC within 24 hours;Address 0x208d withdrew around 15 million USDC during the same period;Address 0x01d7 withdrew about 12.9 million USDC during the same time;Address 0x4016 withdrew 10 million USDC within the last 4 hours.The last similar large liquidity event took place during the week from July 30th to August 8th. During this period, the Bitcoin price dropped from nearly $120,000 to around $110,000 and then quickly rebounded, setting a new high of $124,457. Although whale operations cannot be directly used as a bas

item.title: BlockSec: Detected Suspicious Transaction in Bunni Contract, Resulting in Approximately $2.3 Million Loss
item.description: On September 2nd, the blockchain security company BlockSec announced on social media that its system had detected suspicious transactions targeting the smart contract of the DEX platform Bunni, which led to a loss of approximately $2.3 million.

item.title: Starknet network has been down for 28 minutes
item.description: On September 2nd, the data from Starknet Blockchain Explorer Voyager indicates that the Starknet network has been down for 28 minutes.Previously, it was reported that Starknet tweeted, "Starknet is currently experiencing downtime. The team is actively looking into this issue and striving to restore full functionality as quickly as possible. Updates on the progress will be provided as soon as more information becomes available."

item.title: Starknet: Network Experiencing Downtime, Team Investigating the Issue
item.description: On September 2nd, Starknet posted on the X Platform, saying, "Starknet is currently facing downtime. The team is actively looking into this problem and striving to restore full functionality as soon as possible. We will synchronize the progress for the first time after obtaining more information."

item.title: Bitunix Analyst: WLFI Experiences Massive Volume on First Day of Trading, Followed by Retracement; High Risk of Politicized Token Issuance; Heatmap Indicates Support Level at $0.22 and Resistance L...
item.description: September 2nd: On Monday, September 2nd, WLFI went live and set off a trading frenzy. In just one hour, the trading volume exceeded $1 billion. After opening, the price soared to nearly the $0.40 range and then sharply dropped back to around $0.20 - $0.25 before rebounding. The WLFI liquidation heatmap shows that the range above $0.29 - $0.32 is a zone of high liquidity/orders, with a secondary peak at $0.36 - $0.40. There are also visible support levels around $0.22 - $0.24 and near $0.20. This event has directly linked political and wealth narratives to market frenzy.Bitunix Analyst Recommendation (Event Insights and Advice):WLFI's debut exposed three major risks. Firstly, the extremely high concentration of holdings and the unlocking schedule may lead to valuation mismatches and a liquidity illusion. Secondly, the strong connection of the project with political figures may attract regulatory and legal scrutiny. Thirdly, short-term trading heat does not equal sustainable fundament

item.title: A whale has sold 425 BTC over the past 4 days and shifted its holdings to 10,567 ETH.
item.description: On September 2nd, as monitored by LookOnChain, a whale address 0xFf15 sold 425 BTC ($46.5 million) and purchased 10,567 ETH ($46.5 million) within the past 4 days.

item.title: Sky Founder: Sky Core Simplifies Significantly Reducing Expenses, Current Protocol's Annualized Revenue Reaches $3.38 Billion
item.description: On September 2nd, Rune Christensen, the founder of Sky (formerly MakerDAO), stated on social media, "After significantly reducing core expenses through the simplification of Sky Core, the profit page has been updated. Based on a three-month fee annualized calculation, it now shows real-time stable fee income and savings rate expenditures. The current annualized profit has reached $338 million."

item.title: In the past 5 days, Galaxy Digital has transferred 500,000 SOL to Coinbase, equivalent to approximately $103 million.
item.description: On September 2nd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, Galaxy Digital has deposited 500,000 SOL tokens (approximately $103 million) into Coinbase within the past 5 days.
